DataElement.preferredName: Person Disease-Free Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Period after successful treatment in which there is no appearance of the symptoms or effects of the disease._Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Disease-Free Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Period after successful treatment in which there is no appearance of the symptoms or effects of the disease._Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Disease-Free Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Period after successful treatment in which there is no appearance of the symptoms or effects of the disease.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: The length of time after treatment for a specific disease during which a patient survives with no sign of recurrence of the disease.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
